Welcome to ScapaLog’s documentation!¶

Indices and tables¶

  • Index

ScapaLog main¶

app.create_app(config_class=<class 'app.config.Config'>)¶

Initialise the core application.

Forms¶

class app.forms.LocationsForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

form to add/remove rooms and locations.

class app.forms.LoginForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form to enter user name and password.

class app.forms.NewSubTypeForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form displayed to choose subtype of new item to add to database from the newItem page.

Note

SelectField uses dynamic choices depending on the initial type of product.

class app.forms.NewTypeForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form displayed to choose type of new item to add to database from the newItem page.

class app.forms.SearchInventoryForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class defining the search form for the searchItem page. Class also used for the newItem page.

class app.forms.SearchedItemForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Generic form for a single item returned from a search in the searchItem page.

Note

This class forms the building block of the class SearchedItemListForm.

class app.forms.SearchedItemListForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

Form consisting of a list of SearchItemForm. This is the form that is passed to the searchItem page to display the found items.

class app.forms.StoreForm(*args, **kwargs)¶

form to add item to inventory

Models¶

class app.models.InStock(id_=None, code=None, quantity=None, room=None, storage=None)¶

Class defining an entry in the inventory stock.

Parameters

  • id (str, ObjectId) – corresponds to stock _id in mongoDB database

  • code (str) – string made of the manufacturer and part number values to identify the product

  • quantity (int) – quantity stocked

  • room (str) – room in which the products are stocked

  • storage (str) – place in which the products are stocked

Returns

Instance of Instock with extra variable stocked_date(datetime.utcnow() as data/time of entry into the stock.

class app.models.User(id=None, username=None, password=None)¶

Class to define user characteristics.

Parameters

  • id (str, ObjectId) – corresponds to user _id in mongoDB database

  • username (str) – user name

  • password (str) – user password

Returns

is_active(property): True is_authenticated(property): True is_anonymous(property): False get_id(function): return user id

Return type

Instance of user

Function helpers¶

app.func_helpers.delete_room(room)¶

Function that deletes room name from locations.json

Parameters

room (str) – string returned from Locations.roomList.data

Returns

No return

app.func_helpers.delete_storage(room, storage)¶

Function that deletes storage name from locations.json

Parameters

  • room (str) – string returned from Locations.roomList.data

  • storage (str) – string returned from Locations.storageList.data

Returns

No return

app.func_helpers.get_productDict(subgroup, dict_)¶

Function returning a dictionnary used to instantiate a Product.

Parameters

  • subgroup (str) – subtype of object as string (mirror, window, stage, etc.)

  • dict (dict) – dictionnary of keys/values from formDict data from newItemEntry route

Returns

dictionnary for object instantiation

Return type

productDict(dict)

app.func_helpers.get_products_and_stocks(query)¶

Function returning list of queried products and stocks from initial search in the searchInventory view.

Parameters

query (dict) – dictionnary from the query string returned by the set_query function

Returns

list of product documents (as dict) matching the query stocks(list): list of stocks (as dict) matching the query

Return type

products(list)

app.func_helpers.get_roomList()¶

Function returning a list of tuples to fill Locations.roomList.choices from file locations.json.

Parameters

argument (No) –

Returns

list of rooms as [(room_i, room_i), …]

Return type

room_list(list)

app.func_helpers.get_storageList(room)¶

Function returning a list of tuples to fill Locations.storageList.choices from file locations.json.

Parameters

room (str) – room name used as key to retrieve storages from that room

Returns

list of rooms as [(storage_i, storage_i), …]

Return type

storage_list(list)

app.func_helpers.save_room(room)¶

Function that adds room name to locations.json

Parameters

room (str) – string returned from Locations.room.data

Returns

cleaned room arg with upper letter and removed white spaces

Return type

room(str)

app.func_helpers.save_storage(room, storage)¶

Function that adds storage name to locations.json

Parameters

  • room (str) – string returned from Locations.roomList.data

  • storage (str) – string returned from Locations.storage.data

Returns

cleaned storage name

Return type

storage(str)

app.func_helpers.set_query(group, fields, values)¶

Function creating the query used to search the database. Arguments are obtained from the SearchInventoryForm form from the searchInventory route.

Parameters

  • group (str) – group to which the product belong (mirror, window, stage, etc.)

  • fields (str) – search fields (linked from database keys) from select list

  • values (str) – search values entered by the user in teh SearchInventoryForm form

Returns

query for mongoDB in string form.

Return type

query(str)

app.func_helpers.update_productDict(productId, dataDict)¶

Function returning a dictionnary of keys/values to update in a product.

Parameters

  • productId (str) – key _id of the product to update

  • dataDict (dict) – dictionnary of keys/values from formDict data

Returns

dictionnary of changed keys/values

Return type

productDict(dict)
